TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit MenuItemStyle extends System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style
Public NotInheritable Class MenuItemStyle Inherits Style
public ref class MenuItemStyle sealed : System::Web::UI::WebControls::Style

summary.span: 代表 控制項中功能表項目的樣式。

span.span: Represents the style of a menu item in a control.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用類別，代表功能表項目的樣式控制項。Use the class to represent the style of a menu item in the control. 功能表項目會顯示在靜態功能表或動態功能表。A menu item is displayed in either a static menu or a dynamic menu. 一律會以顯示靜態功能表控制，而只有在使用者將滑鼠指標置於父功能表項目，其中包含動態子功能表時，會顯示動態功能表。A static menu is always displayed in a control, whereas a dynamic menu is displayed only when the user positions the mouse pointer over a parent menu item that contains a dynamic submenu. 您可以指定不同的樣式特性 （例如字型大小和色彩） 的每個不同的功能表項目類型。You can specify different style characteristics (such as font size and color) for each of the different menu item types. 下表列出可用的功能表項目樣式。The following table lists the available menu item styles. |功能表項目樣式屬性Menu item style property|描述Description| |------------------------------|-----------------| ||當滑鼠指標位於動態功能表項目的樣式設定。The style settings for a dynamic menu item when the mouse pointer is positioned over it.| ||個別的動態功能表項目的樣式設定。The style settings for an individual dynamic menu item.| ||針對動態功能表樣式設定。The style settings for a dynamic menu.| ||目前已選取動態功能表項目的樣式設定。The style settings for the currently selected dynamic menu item.| ||當滑鼠指標位於靜態功能表項目的樣式設定。The style settings for a static menu item when the mouse pointer is positioned over it.| ||個別靜態功能表項目的樣式設定。The style settings for an individual static menu item.| ||對於靜態功能表樣式設定。The style settings for a static menu.| ||目前選取之靜態功能表項目的樣式設定。The style settings for the currently selected static menu item.| 當多個樣式屬性會設定靜態功能表項目時，樣式屬性會套用順序如下：When multiple style properties are set for a static menu item, the style properties are applied in the following order: 1. 。. 2. 。. 如果集合或定義集合，它會套用在此階段中，覆寫的其他功能表項目的樣式屬性。If the collection or collection is defined, it is applied at this time, overriding the other menu item style properties. 3. 。. 如果定義集合，它會套用在此階段中，覆寫的其他功能表項目的樣式屬性。If the collection is defined, it is applied at this time, overriding the other menu item style properties. 4. 。. 同樣地，動態功能表項目的樣式屬性會套用順序如下：Likewise, the style properties for a dynamic menu item are applied in the following order: 1. 。. 2. 。. 如果集合或定義集合，它會套用在此階段中，覆寫的其他功能表項目的樣式屬性。If the collection or collection is defined, it is applied at this time, overriding the other menu item style properties. 3. 。. 如果定義集合，它會套用在此階段中，覆寫的其他功能表項目的樣式屬性。If the collection is defined, it is applied at this time, overriding the other menu item style properties. 4. 。. 類別會繼承其成員的大部分類別。The class inherits most of its members from the class. 它會擴充類別透過提供控制的功能表項目的文字周圍的空間，以及相鄰功能表項目之間的空間數量的屬性。It extends the class by providing properties that control the amount of space around a menu item's text, as well as the space between adjacent menu items. 使用屬性，即可控制量左側和右側的功能表項目的文字。Use the property to control the amount of space to the left and right of the menu item's text. 同樣地，屬性會控制和功能表項目的文字下方，上述的間距數量。Similarly, the property controls the amount of space above and below the menu item's text. 您可以控制之間的間距大小的功能表項目，物件套用至，而且其相鄰功能表項目設定屬性。You can control the amount of spacing between the menu item that the object is applied to and its adjacent menu items by setting the property. 如需有關繼承的樣式設定的詳細資訊，請參閱。For more information on the inherited style settings, see . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何控制功能表項目，在外觀控制項的樣式屬性來設定從傳回的物件， ， ，和屬性。The following code example demonstrates how to control the appearance of the menu items in a control by setting the style properties of the object returned from the , , , and properties. [!code-aspx-csharp[MenuItemStyle#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MenuItemStyle/CS/menuitemstylecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[MenuItemStyle#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MenuItemStyle/VB/menuitemstylevb.aspx#1)]

span.span: The to copy.

summary.span: 將指定 物件的樣式屬性複製到 類別的目前執行個體中。

span.span: Copies the style properties of the specified object into the current instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法，以重複指定的樣式屬性物件中呼叫這個方法的物件。Use the method to duplicate the style properties of the specified object in the object that calls this method. > [!CAUTION] > 目前的執行個體中的所有屬性類別將會取代在指定的對應屬性物件。All properties in the current instance of the class will be replaced by the corresponding properties in the specified object. 若要複製樣式屬性，而不會取代任何設定值，請使用方法。To copy style properties without replacing any set values, use the method. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用方法，將複製的樣式設定，另一個物件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method to copy the style settings of another object. [!code-aspx-csharp[MenuItemStyleCopyFrom#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MenuItemStyleCopyFrom/CS/menuitemstylecopyfromcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[MenuItemStyleCopyFrom#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MenuItemStyleCopyFrom/VB/menuitemstylecopyfromvb.aspx#1)]

public: property System::Web::UI::WebControls::Unit HorizontalPadding { System::Web::UI::WebControls::Unit get(); void set(System::Web::UI::WebControls::Unit value); };
member this.HorizontalPadding : System.Web.UI.WebControls.Unit with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定功能表項目文字左側和右側的間距。

span.span: Gets or sets the amount of space to the left and right of the menu item's text.

value.span: 功能表項目文字左側和右側的間距 (以像素為單位)。

span.span: The amount of space (in pixels) to the left and right of the menu item's text.
The default is 0.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性，即可控制功能表項目的文字周圍的水平空間數量物件套用。Use the property to control the amount of horizontal space around the text of the menu item to which the object is applied. 此空間會插入文字的左邊的緣之間的文字區域中，框線和右邊緣的文字和文字的框線之間。This space is inserted between the left edge of the text and the border of the text area, and between the right edge of the text and the text's border. 若要控制的垂直間距，請使用屬性。To control the vertical spacing, use the property. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用前後的功能表項目文字的水平間距藉由以填補 10 個像素為單位的屬性。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to pad the horizontal spacing around the text of a menu item by 10 pixels. [!code-aspx-csharp[MenuItemStyleHorizontalPadding#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MenuItemStyleHorizontalPadding/CS/menuitemstylehorizontalpaddingcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[MenuItemStyleHorizontalPadding#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MenuItemStyleHorizontalPadding/VB/menuitemstylehorizontalpaddingvb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Web::UI::WebControls::Unit ItemSpacing { System::Web::UI::WebControls::Unit get(); void set(System::Web::UI::WebControls::Unit value); };
member this.ItemSpacing : System.Web.UI.WebControls.Unit with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定套用 物件之功能表項目與其相鄰功能表項目的垂直間距。

span.span: Gets or sets the amount of vertical spacing between the menu item to which the object is applied and its adjacent menu items.

value.span: 套用 物件之功能表項目與其相鄰功能表項目的垂直間距 (以像素為單位)。

span.span: The amount of vertical spacing (in pixels) between the menu item to which the object is applied and its adjacent menu items.
The default is 0.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性，即可控制功能表項目之間的垂直間距量物件套用，以及其相鄰功能表項目相同層級。Use the property to control the amount of vertical spacing between a menu item to which the object is applied and its adjacent menu items at the same level. 此空間會插入目前的功能表項目的上邊緣與上一個的功能表項目，以及目前的功能表項目的下邊緣和下一步 的功能表項目的上邊緣之間的下邊緣之間。This space is inserted between the upper edge of the current menu item and the lower edge of the previous menu item, as well as between the lower edge of the current menu item and upper edge of the next menu item. > [!NOTE] > 上方的空間中的第一個功能表項目不需呈現控制項。The upper space is not rendered for the first menu item in the control. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用分開與其相鄰功能表項目中的功能表項目，5 個像素的屬性。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to separate a menu item from its adjacent menu items by 5 pixels. [!code-aspx-csharp[MenuItemStyleItemSpacing#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MenuItemStyleItemSpacing/CS/menuitemstyleitemspacingcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[MenuItemStyleItemSpacing#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MenuItemStyleItemSpacing/VB/menuitemstyleitemspacingvb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void MergeWith(class System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style s) cil managed
Public Overrides Sub MergeWith (s As Style)

span.span: The to combine settings with.

summary.span: 將指定 物件的樣式屬性與 類別目前執行個體的樣式屬性結合。

span.span: Combines the style properties of the specified object with those of the current instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法來結合指定的樣式屬性物件的樣式屬性從呼叫這個方法的物件。Use the method to combine the style properties of the specified object with the style properties of the object that this method is called from. > [!CAUTION] > 此方法加入的樣式屬性設定中目前未設定每個屬性物件及其對應的值，指定物件。This method joins the style properties by setting each property that is not set in the current object with its corresponding value in the specified object. 尚未設定的屬性將會更新。Only properties that have not been set will be updated. 如果在指定的屬性物件未設定，在目前的對應屬性物件不會變更。If a property in the specified object is not set, the corresponding property in the current object does not change. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用方法來結合目前的執行個體的樣式設定類別的另一個物件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method to combine the style settings of the current instance of the class with another object. [!code-aspx-csharp[MenuItemStyleMergeWith#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MenuItemStyleMergeWith/CS/menuitemstylemergewithcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[MenuItemStyleMergeWith#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MenuItemStyleMergeWith/VB/menuitemstylemergewithvb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 讓 類別的目前執行個體返回其原始狀態。

span.span: Returns the current instance of the class to its original state.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法，以移除任何已定義樣式項目從狀態包，並重設為其原始狀態的物件。Use the method to remove any defined style elements from the state bag and reset the object to its original state. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用方法來傳回目前為其原始狀態的物件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method to return the current object to its original state. [!code-aspx-csharp[MenuItemStyleCopyFrom#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MenuItemStyleCopyFrom/CS/menuitemstylecopyfromcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[MenuItemStyleCopyFrom#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MenuItemStyleCopyFrom/VB/menuitemstylecopyfromvb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 取得或設定功能表項目文字上方和下方的間距。

span.span: Gets or sets the amount of space above and below a menu item's text.

value.span: 功能表項目文字上方和下方的間距 (以像素為單位)。

span.span: The amount of space (in pixels) above and below a menu item's text.
The default is 0.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性，即可控制功能表項目的文字周圍的垂直空間數量物件套用。Use the property to control the amount of vertical space around the text of the menu item to which the object is applied. 此空間會插入文字的上邊緣之間的文字區域，以及文字的下邊緣和文字的框線之間的框線。This space is inserted between the upper edge of the text and the border of the text area, as well as between the lower edge of the text and the text's border. 若要控制水平間距，請使用屬性。To control the horizontal spacing, use the property. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用前後的功能表項目文字的垂直間距藉由以填補 10 個像素為單位的屬性。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to pad the vertical spacing around the text of a menu item by 10 pixels.
